translated: I, the youngest of his subjects, Ngawang Phuntsok Lhundrup, born in the Se clan in the upper part of Tsang, in the region of Dar, have studied a little of the tradition of grammar through the immeasurable kindness of that holy one.

original: ming gzhan tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyom las pas /

translated: studied the grammar of the text and its meaning in the presence of the great pandit Balaprabha, who was born in a pure Brahmin family in Kuruksetra in the land of the noble ones, and of the two brothers, the pandits Gokulanatha and Misra.

original: dper brjod sogs legs par nyan te gzhung bod skad du bsgyur /
analyzed: dper brjod sogs legs par nyan te gzhung bod skad du bsgyur /
translated: I listened well to the examples and so forth, and translated the text into Tibetan.

original: slob dpon chen po r'a ma tsandras mdzad pa'i 'grel pa pra kri ya ste rab tu bya ba zhes pa gzhir bzhag / kun bshad sogs cho ga rtogs dka' ba rnams la slob dpon mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun gyis zur brgyan te cung zad rgyas par byas /

translated: I took as a basis the commentary called Praká¹›iyakriyÄ, composed by the great master RÄmacandra, and I slightly expanded it by adding some ornaments with the oral tradition of learned masters on the difficult-to-understand topics such as the complete explanation and so forth.

original: rtogs sla ba rnams nyung ngur byas te /
analyzed: rtogs sla ba rnams nyung ngur byas te /
translated: I made the easy-to-understand topics brief.

original: me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nya gsum cu rtsa gcig bsre ba rnam 'phyang zhes pa sa pho khyi lo rang lo (rtsa ba sgrub kyi mtshan bu zhip pa btab yod/) nyer lngar sleb pa chu stod zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar
analyzed: me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nya gsum cu rtsa gcig bsre ba rnam 'phyang zhes pa sa pho khyi lo rang lo (rtsa ba sgrub kyi mtshan bu zhip pa btab yod/) nyer lngar sleb pa chu stod zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar
translated: The year of the male earth dog (1478) was the sixty-first year of the sexagenary cycle, and the thirty-first year of my life.

original: 'go brtsams / kun ldan zhes pa lcags byi nag pa zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa pa she'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus dge bar chos grva chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi rang shag rgyud steng spyil por sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can yongs la
analyzed: 'go brtsams / kun ldan zhes pa lcags byi nag pa zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa pa she'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus dge bar chos grva chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi rang shag rgyud steng spyil por sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can yongs la
translated: May this work be of benefit to the teachings and to all beings.ğŸ”½Since I am very young in terms of intelligence, there are many mistakes in the translation and contradictions and errors in the examples and meanings.

original: phan par gyur cig / ces pa 'di la bdag nyid blo gros kyi na tshod shin tu gzhon pas 'gyur ma dag pa dang / dper brjod go don sogs la 'gal 'khrul snang na bla ma mchog dang mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzod la tshul bzhin 'chos par mdzad du gsol /
analyzed: phan par gyur cig / ces pa 'di la bdag nyid blo gros kyi na tshod shin tu gzhon pas 'gyur ma dag pa dang / dper brjod go don sogs la 'gal 'khrul snang na bla ma mchog dang mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzod la tshul bzhin 'chos par mdzad du gsol /
translated: If this is the case, may the supreme gurus and hosts of scholars forgive me and correct me properly.

original: dge 'dis dpal stug gsang ba kun 'dus rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi 'dzin //
analyzed: dge 'dis dpal stug gsang ba kun 'dus rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi 'dzin //
translated: By this virtue, may the glorious and precious earth of the Gathering of Secrets be held.

original: mtha' yas gdul bya skabs gsum yongs kyi gnyen gcig dpal ldan ngag gi dbang //
analyzed: mtha' yas gdul bya skabs gsum yongs kyi gnyen gcig dpal ldan ngag gi dbang //
translated: The sole friend of the three times of infinite disciples is the glorious lord of speech.

original: blo gros bzang po'i nyi zlas rab 'khyud rgya chen shes bya'i mkha' la khyab //
analyzed: blo gros bzang po'i nyi zlas rab 'khyud rgya chen shes bya'i mkha' la khyab //
translated: The sun and moon of good intelligence embrace it, pervading the sky of vast knowledge.ğŸ”½May the glory of the ocean-like knowledge of the Victorious One remain for a long time,

original: mtsho ltar zab yangs mkhyen pa'i dpal mnga' ji srid bar du brtan pa dang // bgrang yas skye dgu'i legs byas kyis bskrun lugs zung khrims kyi gdugs dkar po //
analyzed: mtsho ltar zab yangs mkhyen pa'i dpal mnga' ji srid bar du brtan pa dang // bgrang yas skye dgu'i legs byas kyis bskrun lugs zung khrims kyi gdugs dkar po //
translated: and may the white parasol of the two systems of ethics, created by the good deeds of innumerable beings,

original: phul byung khyon yangs 'dod dgu'i dpal ster yid bzhin nor bu'i tog gis sbras //
analyzed: phul byung khyon yangs 'dod dgu'i dpal ster yid bzhin nor bu'i tog gis sbras //
translated: be adorned with the crest-jewel, the source of the glory of all that is desired.ğŸ”½May the cooling shade of benefit and happiness,

original: nam yang 'gog med mkha' la rab bteg phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil gang //
analyzed: nam yang 'gog med mkha' la rab bteg phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil gang //
translated: which is always raised in the sky without obstruction,ğŸ”½be supremely beautiful, removing the heat of the discordant elements for the teachings and beings.

original: bstan dang 'gro ba'i mi mthun gdung sel mchog tu lhag par mdzes gyur cig / tshul 'dir log rtog rdul gyis nyer bsgribs nas //
analyzed: bstan dang 'gro ba'i mi mthun gdung sel mchog tu lhag par mdzes gyur cig / tshul 'dir log rtog rdul gyis nyer bsgribs nas //
translated: If the face of the text's meaning is obscured by the dust of wrong thoughts,

original: gzhung don dga' ma'i bzhin ras mi gsal na //
analyzed: gzhung don dga' ma'i bzhin ras mi gsal na //
translated: and the face of the beloved meaning is not clear,

original: mkhas mchog dam pa'i spyan sngar mi 'chab pas //
analyzed: mkhas mchog dam pa'i spyan sngar mi 'chab pas //
translated: I do not conceal it from the eyes of the supreme scholars.

original: dpyad gsum dag pas byi dor mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: dpyad gsum dag pas byi dor mdzad du gsol //
translated: I request them to polish it with the three analyses.

original: gang gi rig tshul gangg'a'i yab gcig las //
analyzed: gang gi rig tshul gangg'a'i yab gcig las //
translated: From the single father of the Ganges of reasoning methods,

original: nyer 'ongs legs tshogs rab dangs dal 'gro yis //
analyzed: nyer 'ongs legs tshogs rab dangs dal 'gro yis //
translated: May the pure light of the good and wholesome that has come to me

original: yid can rmongs pa'i dri ma kun bkrus nas //
analyzed: yid can rmongs pa'i dri ma kun bkrus nas //
translated: wash away all the stains of delusion of the beings,

original: kun mkhyen rin chen rgya mtshor 'jug par shog //
analyzed: kun mkhyen rin chen rgya mtshor 'jug par shog //
translated: and may they enter the ocean of the jewels of omniscience.
